message: I propose we divide the money with an 80/20 split. I believe this is fair considering the risk and potential inflation.
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more considering the risk of inflation is higher for me.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 72/28 split. This reflects the decrease in value of our currency and aims for a fair division.
I'm willing to give you a higher share, but I think 45 is still too low considering the inflation is affecting me more.
